long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Organize your social interactions with your friends and family.

Monica is a simple, private, open source personal CRM that lets you add contacts and record what's important about them. It lets you organize your contacts in a way that is unique to you, visible only by you, so you can actually remember the things that are important.


This tool is updated regularly and new features are added every month. Join 10,000+ users!

Features:

✔️ Add and manage contacts
✔️ Add significant others and children
✔️ Auto reminders for birthdays
✔️ Reminders are sent by email
✔️ Management of debts
✔️ Ability to add notes to a contact
✔️ Ability to indicate how you've met someone
✔️ Management of activities done with a contact
✔️ Management of tasks
✔️ Management of gifts
✔️ Basic journal
✔️ Export and import of data
✔️ Multi users
✔️ Labels to organize contacts
✔️ Multi currencies
✔️ Multi languages
✔️ An API that covers most of the data

Monica is for people who have jobs, a family, and are busy trying to find a good work/life balance. So busy, that they don’t have time anymore to remember to call a friend, say happy birthday to a nephew, or remember to invite someone special for dinner next week. The older we get the more life gets in the way.
